nodes.text: Pinnacle of Freedom, The Resistance was a pro-Resistance propaganda piece Janyor of Bith made on the eve of the Hosnian Cataclysm. It features a T-70 X-wing starfighter set on a Resistance starbird, below it are snow-capped mountains.
Pinnacle of Freedom, The Resistance is an in-universe artwork in the canon artbook Star Wars Propaganda: A History of Persuasive Art in the Galaxy. It was illustrated by Rosanna Brockley.
